title: Qohaito
description: A pre-Aksumite and Aksumite settlement located in what is now southern Eritrea, possibly to be identified as the Koloe mentioned in a Roman imperial source. Qohaito has been submitted by Eritrea for consideration as a UNESCO World Heritage site.

properties.description: Representative point chosen with reference to Google Earth. Dates after BAtlas.
properties.title: Imagery Location for the Centerpoint of Qoahito
